modName: Blacksmiths Guild - Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
summary: Adds Dragten\'s Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches to their own exclusive Dragten\'s Master Forge at the Blacksmiths\' Guild - no more crafting menu clutter!!!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=+2]Dragten\'s Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches at The Blacksmiths\' Guild[/color][/size]


[color=orange][size=+1]*****Eliminates crafting menu clutter by placing items into their own exclusive forge*****[/color][/size]


[color=red][size=+1]*****This mod is a crafting .esp only and contains no bandolier, bag or pouch meshes/textures!!!!***** [/color][/size][/center]

[size=+1]How does it work?[/size] 

[color=orange][size=+1]1)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Blacksmiths\' Guild core mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]2)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16438] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16438[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]3)[/color][/size] De-activate/Uncheck Dr_Bandolier.esp 
[color=red]Do this before downloading my Dr_Bandolier.esp to avoid a clash of the two files . . .[/color]
this step will:
-	keep Dragten\'s meshes/textures \'in the background\'
-	eliminate the current stats on the bandoliers etc.

[color=orange][size=+1]4)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM the Dr_Bandolier file from this page here . . . the one you\'re on now . . . 

[color=orange][size=+1]5)[/color][/size] Confirm my Dr_Bandolier.esp is Activated/Checked
this step will:
-	allow my .esp to access Dragten\'s meshes/textures
-	add Dragten\'s Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches to Dragten\'s Master Forge at the Blacksmiths\' Guild
-	distribute Dragten\'s Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches across two crafting perks
---              No Perk = all the box pouches and the dark leather
---              Steel Perk = Assorted Buckles and all the rest of the Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches
-	add a light sprinkling of Dragten\'s Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches to various \'Treasure Chest\' levelled lists

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=red]Notes:[/size][/color]
[color=orange]1)[/color] All Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches are crafted under the \'Leather Category\' at Dragten\'s Master Forge
[color=orange]2)[/color] All of the Box Pouches can be crafted with \'No Perk\'
[color=orange]3)[/color] All other Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches require \'Assorted (steel) Buckles\' and, therefore, the \'Steel Perk\'
--- You need 1 \'Steel Ingot\' to make 2 \'Assorted (steel) Buckles\'
[color=orange]4)[/color] \'Dark Leather\' is now made at \'Dragten\' Leather Dyeing Pot\' right beside Dragten\'s Forge
--- there is Tanning Rack on the other side of Dragten\'s Forge for crafting vanilla leather to go into the Dye Pot -added convenience!!!
[color=orange]5)[/color] Items have been re-labelled, by position of equipping on the body, to ease sorting
--- Bandoliers are \'Bandoliers\' (obviously!)
--- L/B - left, back position
--- L/F - left, front position
--- L/S - left, side position
--- R/B - right, back position
--- R/F - right, front position
--- R/S - right, side position
------ you can only equip one item in each position . . . 
[color=orange]6)[/color] Carryweight enchantments have been reduced to better represent \'bag size\' and to balance with The Witcher Sword Belt/Bandoliers (20 carryweight) and the Sabre Gear Back Packs (50 and 100 carryweight)
--- Old 100 - now 30
--- Old   75 - now 25
--- Old   50 - now 18
--- Old   25 - now  8
[color=orange]7)[/color] All Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches now weigh between 1 and 4 Skyrim units
[color=orange]8)[/color] All Bandoliers, Bags and Pouches now add between 1 and 4 Light Armor (Leather) Damage Protection points

----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

Dragten is the owner of the intellectual property/assets presented here - I only adjusted the \'craftability.\' Feel free to open up my .esp and play with it; but, give me some credit if you then re-upload anything.

Check with Dragten about the meshes/textures.

-------------------------------------------
